codeSnippets.title: Task Prioritization Matrix
codeSnippets.code:
Priority Matrix:
High Impact + High Effort = Plan carefully
High Impact + Low Effort = Do first
Low Impact + High Effort = Avoid
Low Impact + Low Effort = Do last

Factors to consider:
- Business value
- Technical complexity
- Dependencies
- Risk level
- Learning opportunities

codeSnippets.title: Sprint Metrics Calculation
codeSnippets.code:
Velocity = Total story points completed / Sprint duration
Burn Rate = Tasks completed / Days elapsed
Completion Rate = Completed tasks / Total planned tasks
Blocker Impact = Blocked story points / Total sprint points

Healthy Sprint Indicators:
- Burn rate consistent with timeline
- Completion rate > 80%
- Blocker impact < 20%
